title: Mushroom, bacon and spring onion quiche
ingredients: ['1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1/2 tablespoon butter', '1 small bunch spring onions, chopped', '200g bacon, cubed', '150g portabellini mushrooms, sliced', '150g fontina cheese, grated', '1 egg', '125ml single cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
